name: Dinosaur Survival Safari Hunter
description: Epic Dino hunting survival game 3d. Pure primal carnage dinosaur hunting safari game. T-rex survival simulator dino hunting in the jurassic desert with high powered rifles never felt so fun. The deadly T-rex will hunt you back unlike the typical deer hunting games or even duck hunting games. Thats no fun! This dinosaur hunting simulator 3d dino survivor will make you into an elite legend. Great guns to unlock to help in your quest for glory.
